**\*** Recent versions of DeGAUSS containers are hosted on the GitHub Container Registry and now require the `ghcr.io` prefix in a [DeGAUSS command](anatomy_of_degauss_command.html) to specify this. Older DeGAUSS images were hosted on [Docker Hub](https://hub.docker.com/u/degauss) and many are still available there. 

**\*\*** The badges display the most recent version of each DeGAUSS image. Click the badge to visit the GitHub releases page with notes about changes made in each version. When running a DeGAUSS container image, it is possible to specify an older version by changing the tag at the end of the repo/image name, e.g. `ghcr.io/degauss-org/geocoder:3.0.1`.
